refnamediv.refpurpose: generates a pretty-print table from an SDF syntax definition

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: ppgen generates from an SDF syntax definition a pretty-print table with an entry for each context-free syntax production with a constructor annotation.

Typically, it is necessary to edit the pretty-print table to add appropriate Box markup to the entries. In a package using Make the modified result should be saved under a different name to avoid overwriting it.
